mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_id, mem_password, mem_type, mem_age, mem_email, mem_name, mem_wdate, mem_ca, mem_auth) values (#{mem_id}, #{mem_password}, #{mem_type}, #{mem_age}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_name}, sysdate, #{mem_ca}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(mem_id) FROM member WHERE mem_id= #{mem_id}
select mem_id, mem_type, mem_ca, mem_auth from member where mem_id = #{param1} and mem_password= #{param2}
select mem_id, mem_name, mem_email, mem_password from member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_name=#{mem_name} and mem_email=#{mem_email}
select mem_id, mem_name from member where mem_name=#{mem_name} and mem_email=#{mem_email}
select mem_id, mem_password, mem_type, mem_email, mem_name, mem_wdate, mem_ca, mem_auth from member where mem_id =#{mem_id}
mapper.update: update member set mem_password=#{mem_password}, mem_type=#{mem_type}, mem_email=#{mem_email}, mem_name=#{mem_name}, mem_ca=#{mem_ca} where mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.select: select mem_email, mem_attend from member where mem_attend = 0
